The show started on July 8 at 8.45 pm on [[TF1]] and will conclude on October 14, 2011, lasting 99 days. The winner of this season is Marie Garet.
==Housemates== ===Anthony=== He is 26, from Narbonne in [[France]]. His secret is that he is a former elite sniper. On Day 1, he was nominated with Elizabeth. He won his place in the House with 75%. He was evicted Day 8.
===AurÃ©lie=== She is 23 years. She entered the house on Day 1. She is in couple with Geof but she has to play comedy with Geoffrey, Marie's husband. She had a relation with Rudy but he was evicted the 3rd week.
===Ayem=== She is 22 years old, her name Ayem and is the first candidate Secret Story 5 (unveiled Thursday, July 7 online). She is single and hopes to find love among the participants. She enters the house on Day 1. Her secret is to be a fake couple with Daniel, but for the moment, she doesn't know who is her partner. She must find him. She was elected the sexiest girl in this season of Secrer Story.
===Daniel=== He is 21 years. He enters the house on Day 1. His secret is to be a fake couple with Ayem.
===Elizabeth=== Elizabeth is 20. Her secret is that she is gifted. She entered on the Cristal Ball and she was nominated with Anthony. She lost her place in the House with 25%. She was evicted on Day 1.
===Geof=== He is 26, from Pieters Leevru in Belgium. He is in a relationship with AurÃ©lie, but is pretending to be married to Marie to protect the secret.
===Geoffrey=== He is 23, from Montpellier, France. He is married to Marie, although to protect this secret he is pretending to be in a relationship with AurÃ©lie, who is in actuality in a relationship with Geof.
===Jonathan=== He is 26, and he is from Nice. His secret is that he is a free mason.
===Julie=== She is 23. She was evicted on Day 15.
===Juliette=== She is 20 years. She enters the house on Day 1. She was evicted on Day 85.
===Marie=== She is 26 from Montpellier. Her secret is that she is in a relationship with Geoffrey but in order to protect her secret she has to play the comedy with Geof who is actually in a relationship with Aurelie. She is declared winner of this fifth season on Day 98 before Zelko, AurÃ©lie and Geoffrey.
===Marie-JosÃ©e=== She is 39. Her secret is she was a nun. She walked Day 9 because she miss her son.
===Morgan=== He is 21. His secret is to be cheerleader. He lives in Toulouse (France).
===Morgane "Mogo"=== Her secret is that her father is called Brigitte. She was evicted on Day 92.
===Rudy=== He's 21. He discovers the half of the secret of Sabrina Day 20. He has a relation with AurÃ©lie.
===Sabrina===
She is 30. Her secret is she lives with someonelse's lungs due to a disease that nearly took her life.
===Simon=== He entered the house on Day 1. He is 20 years old.
===Zarko=== He is 23 years and Zelko is his twin from [[Serbia]]. He enters the house on Day 0, before the other housemates with his brother, on the "Underground Labyrinth".
===Zelko=== He is 23 years and Zarko is his twin from [[Serbia]]. He enters the house on Day 0, before the other housemates with his brother, on the "Underground Labyrinth".

==Weeks== ===Week 1: July 8 to July 14=== * '''Friday - Day 1''': Ayem & Daniel are a fake couple, but are not aware who is their secret partner and have to find out themselves. AurÃ©lie and Geof, Marie and Geoffray are a couple, this is their secret, however, La Voix decided to switch AurÃ©lie with Geoffray, and Marie with Geof. . The twins, Zelko and Zarko are the masters of the underground labyrinth. They have a huge power, being able to choose who they want to see nominated every week and forever until the eviction of the housemate they chose. They chose Morgan, Sabrina and Simon, and have only until Tuesday to change their mind if they want. Anthony and Elizabeth were automatically nominated for eviction after ten minutes of entrance, viewers decided to keep Anthony and Elizabeth was evicted
* '''Saturday - Day 2''': Ayem and Daniel managed to discover that they are a fake couple. Morgan believes that the two couples in the House have a link together. Zarko triggered the secret alarm, and believes that Geoffrey and AurÃ©lie's secret is that they are a look-a-like of Barbie and Ken. Zarko chose to confirm his "buzz", however, that is not their secret which cost Zarko â¬5,000. The Masters of the Underground decided to change their nominations to Rudy, Juliette and Zarko (one of the masters, to prevent other housemates from exposing their secret). Rudy was very angry about this decision, while Juliette was sad and hopes that the "Masters of Underground" don't choose her to be nominated for all evictions. Ayem and Daniel decided to pretend that they are attracted to each other so their secret is more believable.
* '''Sunday - Day 3''': La Voix offered housemates the chance to break their permanent nomination. If any of the housemates successfully solve it, they will break their permanent nomination, however, no one solved it. Zarko & Zelko once again chose to change their nominations, but this time they swapped Juliette with Julie. Today, Daniel triggered the secret alarm, believing that Geoffrey and AurÃ©lie are siblings, he confirmed his buzz, but it was incorrect and cost him â¬5,000. Marie decided to convince other housemates that Geoffrey is in fact gay, with some believing her, Geoffrey was not happy about this, and confronted her, with Marie apologizing and saying she didn't like that AurÃ©lie and Geoffrey are not playing the game.
* '''Monday - Day 4''': Marie had a discussion with Geof (AurÃ©lie's boyfriend), and thinks that she is playing a double game and is jealous of Marie. Jonathan and Zelko had an argument as Jonathan does not like how Zelko behaves, thinking he is false and is putting on a show purely for cameras. Today, for the third time Zarko and Zelko changed their nominations, but this time they decided that it will be Ayem who will face every eviction and becomes permanently nominated, she will save herself from eviction if she exposes who is responsible for her nomination, however, all housemates believe that the people responsible are in an Intruder House. La Voix offered a secret mission to Geoffrey. For â¬1,000, he must kiss AurÃ©lie, at first he accepted the secret mission but after he repeated the mission to AurÃ©lie, he preferred to give up the secret mission.
* '''Tuesday - Day 5''': Ayem was disappointed that Anthony told Daniel that he finds her too seductive behind her back, and Ayem said that she doesn't even try to seduce Anthony or is attracted to him. La Voix offered housemates a task in which they have to memorise the rules (commandments) off by heart. Today, hosuemates nominated for the first time with females nominating males housemates. Anthony, Daniel and Zelko received most votes and were nominated for eviction, with Ayem being permanently nominated, she was also up for eviction. Zelko was confused as to why he was nominated, while Daniel was not expecting it, Daniel also said to Zelko and Anthony that he lost confidence in the girls. Morgan noticed a hand in the ventilation opening. and believes that the intruders are living in the underground, he thinks that Elizabeth, who was evicted shortly after entering the house is in there. However, the hand belonged to Zelko. However no one realised that the twin brothers were in the confessional at the time of Morgan's discovery.
* '''Wednesday - Day 6''': Rudy tried to talk to the intruders that the house believes exist via an air vent, but no intruders actually exist. The Masters of Underground sent a message to Geof and Marie, saying "Games of chances are doing good things", but neither of them understand it's meaning, however, AurÃ©lie thinks that the Masters of Underground are aware about the secret of both couples and that Masters of Underground think that Geof actually enjoys pretending to be a couple with Marie, which really worries AurÃ©lie as she is becoming doubtful of her future with Geof. Today is Morgane's 21st birthday, and La Voix set up a party for her and other housemates, during the party, Morgane and Geoffrey danced, with some seeing it as a sultry dance, which upset Marie, and said to Geof and Geoffrey never dances with her like that, Marie's and Geoffrey's relationship seems to be on the verge of collapse.
* '''Thursday - Day 7''': In the garden, Morgane talked to Marie, she thinks that the reason why Marie never mentions the name of Geof, is that she is afraid to slip out the name Geoffrey (as Geof and Geoffrey are the same names), Morgane realises the possibility that the couples partners were inverted. The Masters of Underground sent a new message to housemate and more precisely to Rudy and AurÃ©lie: "Rudy, AurÃ©lie, follow our tips". Ayem thinks spies are in the House and there is no intruder house. Daniel received a secret mission, he must kiss Ayem on the mouth but Daniel revealed his secret mission to Ayem. Marie-JosÃ©e triggered the secret alarm, she believes Geoffrey and Marie are brother and sister. The Masters of Underground sent a new message again, the message says: "Marie and Geof, AurÃ©lie and Geoffrey, Two separate worlds do not fit easily". Candidates must support the nominee they prefer. Marie, Zarko and Marie-JosÃ©e support Zelko. Morgane, Julie and Geoffrey support Anthony. AurÃ©lie, Morgan, Sabrina and Jonathan support Ayem. And Simon, Juliette, and Rudy support Daniel.
===Week 2: July 15 to July 21=== * '''Friday - Day 8 (Before the Gala)''': ** '''Friday - Day 8 (Gala - Prime time)''': Ayem entered in the Room of Suspicion. She must investigate to try to discover who is responsible for her nomination forever. If a housemate lies, its face flushed. Couples have the opportunity to see themselves but only one couple will be able to touch and to kiss themselves. They must decided unanimously. After 10 minutes, Marie and Geoffrey have that opportunity. La Voix asks to Ayem to make a short list of housemates she suspects. Ayem made her shot list, she suspects Jonathan, Morgane, Geof, Juliette and Zarko. La Voix announces to Ayem that on her short list she made, one is guilty. At the end of the Gala, Anthony is evicted with 10% to save. ***'''Friday - Day 8 (After the Gala)''': Morgane cries because she is suspected of being guilty by Ayem while did nothing. Ayem explains that this is the game, there is nothing wrong about the Ayem's choice. After an hour, Ayem has a discussion with Zarko. She says to Zarko: "I know it's you".
* '''Saturday - Day 9''': Marie-JosÃ©e has decided to left the House because she miss her son.
* '''Monday - Day 11''': Ayem must give to La Voix the name of the housemate she thinks is responsible of her nomination forever. If she give the good name, she won't be nominated forever but Zarko and Zelko will be, if she give the bad name, she will be nominated until her eviction. Ayem thinks Juliette and Jonathan are responsible of her eviction. She doesn't discover who's responsible. She is nominated for ever until her eviction.
* '''Tuesday - Day 12''':Two girls are nominated alongside Ayem by the male housemates. This is Julie and Juliette. Rudy and AurÃ©lie are becoming closer as Simon and Juliette. La Voix proposes to carry out an examination in order to unmask those responsible for the life tenure of Ayem where each inhabitant could charge and ask questions to the candidates of their choice. After that, each person went to confession in order to give the name of the person he considers to be responsible(s). Julie and Jonathan then unmask the twins Zarko and Zelko.
* '''Wednesday - Day 13''': Marie and Geof have a big fight.
===Week 3: July 22 to July 28=== ** '''Friday - Day 15 (During the Gala)''': A new piece has been introduced: the Hall of revelation. La Voix announces that Jonathan has discovered who's responsible of the Ayem's nomination forever. La Voix asks Jonathan to say who names he gave. Jonathan revealed that he said Zarko & Zeljko. La Voix asks to Zarko and Zelko to left immediately the House of Secrets. Actually they are going to the Underground and to the Repair. They'll live on the repair until Monday. Morgan is their accomplice because on Day 5, he suspected intruders lived in the Underground. La Voix does a new revelation to housemates and particularly to Jonathan because of his discovery, he has the power to nominate forever the housemate of his choice. He will give an answer on Monday. La Voix remains that Ayem stays nominated until her eviction. So, in the adventure, there will be two housemates nominated forever. La Voix made a proposition to Marie, Geof, AurÃ©lie and Geoffrey on the Revelations Room. La Voix revealed to couples that the proposition is indecent. For 10,000â¬, La Voix proposes a secret mission to Geof. He must conquer a girl in the house. This girl is simply AurÃ©lie, his real girlfriend. They will have to convince housemates that they fall in love and Geoffrey and Marie must make believe to other housemates that they feel betrayed. Geoff have the key to a new room for couples: Love's Room. Daniel must seduce Morgane to test the jealousy of Ayem. Julie is evicted with 13% to save. Ayem & Juliette are saved with 45 and 42% to save. ** '''Friday - Day 15 (After the Gala)''': Zarko and Zelko try to find a strategy to not be nominated forever by Jonathan. Also, Jonathan does not know who he could nominate, he said to Geof that he wants to nominated forever himself but Geof said to Jonathan that he should not even if Jonathan is attached to several housemates. Geof: "They are not your real friends, they are not your family!". About Daniel, he plays a bit with Morgane, will he succeed to seduce her without hurting her ?
* '''Monday - Day 18''': La Voix gave an enigma to Ayem. She must solve this enigma to get rid of her nomination forever. Few minutes later, Ayem solved the enigma. She is rid of her nomination forever. Jonathan won the power of the nomination forever Friday. He decided to nominate forever Zarko. Jonathan and Morgan exchange a kiss.
*'''Tuesday - Day 19''': Rudy and Aurelie are in couple and Aurelie separated from Geof. The girls choose to nominate Zelko and Rudy with Zarko.
*'''Wednesday - Day 20''': Juliette is elected Miss Secret Story 5. Rudy discovered the half of the secret of Sabrina (I live with someone lungs) and won the half of the Sabrina's pot, she is very emotional. Ayem and Daniel have some arguments.
*'''Thursday - Day 21''': Daniel cracks due to Ayem. Geof discovered the remains of the secret of Sabrina and then won the rest of his pot. AurÃ©lie is afraid that Rudy leave the next day.
===Week 4: July 29 to August 4===
** '''Friday - Day 22 (During the Gala)''': At the prime of July 29, 2011, the Bridge of sacrifices is back, the candidates perform the sacrifices and have lost or gained money, but have also been immunized or nominated for office to protect their secrets. thus:
*The kitties have been turned upside down. *Some candidates get buzz free because they have passed all the sacrifices and won the index of their opponent. *Rudy immune to future nominations AurÃ©lie. *Geoffrey was nominated officially by Morgan to future appointments boys. *The twins found their mother in the airlock by Ayem. *The girls escape the appointment this week thanks to Sabrina, it will therefore appointment this week boys. *Morgan is automatically nominated this week by Zarko, Zelko and Rudy.
==Nominations== Nominations follow a different formula than is typical of the Big Brother franchise. Each week the housemates alternate nominations: male housemates nominate female housemates one week, and female housemates nominate male housemates the following week. In some weeks housemates are only permitted to nominate one housemate, rather than the typical two; this, usually occurs when at least one housemate has been already nominated by La Voix (Big Brother). Also, during some weeks, twist occur which affect the nomination procedure. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:85%; line-height:13px;" ! rowspan="2" style="width: 2%;" | ! colspan="2" style="width: 10%;" | '''Week 1''' ! rowspan="2" style="width: 2%;" | '''Week 2''' ! rowspan="2" style="width: 2%;" | '''Week 3''' ! rowspan="2" style="width: 2%;" | '''Week 4''' ! rowspan="2" style="width: 2%;" | '''Week 5''' ! rowspan="2" style="width: 2%;" | '''Week 6''' ! rowspan="2" style="width: 2%;" | '''Week 7''' ! rowspan="2" style="width: 2%;" | '''Week 8''' ! rowspan="2" style="width: 2%;" | {{nowrap|'''Week 9'''}} ! rowspan="2" style="width: 2%;" | '''Week 10''' ! rowspan="2" style="width: 2%;" | '''Week 11''' ! rowspan="2" style="width: 2%;" | {{nowrap|'''Week 12'''}} ! rowspan="2" style="width: 2%;" | '''Week 13''' ! rowspan="2" style="width: 2%;" colspan=2 | '''Week 14''' |- !style="width:2%" | Day 1 !style="width:2%" | Day 5 |- ! <small>{{note|1|Note 1}}: Anthony and Elizabeth are nominated to enter in the House. Viewers have to choose who deserve to enter in the house with his/her secret.</small>
<small>{{note|2|Note 2}}: Zarko and Zelko could nominate one housemate forever until the eviction of the housemate that they choosed.</small>
<small>{{note|3|Note 3}}: In week one of nominations, only female housemates could nominate.</small>
<small>{{note|4|Note 4}}: Ayem does not discover who is responsible of her nomination forever. She is definitely nominated until her eviction.</small>
<small>{{note|5|Note 5}}: In week two of nominations, only male housemates could nominate.</small>
<small>{{note|6|Note 6}}: In week three of nominations, only female housemates could nominate.</small>
<small>{{note|7|Note 7}}: To protect his secret and don't lose money, Rudy has accepted to immune AurÃ©lie.</small>
<small>{{note|8|Note 8}}: To protect his secret, Morgan accepted to nominate Geoffrey.</small>
<small>{{note|9|Note 9}}: To protect them secrets, Zarko, Zelko and Rudy accepted to nominate Morgan.</small>
<small>{{note|10|Note 10}}: In week four of nominations, only female housemates could nominate. They have to nominate only one male housemate.</small>
<small>{{note|11|Note 11}}: Juliette is on the Secret Room, and she has the power to be the only housemate to nominate two female housemates. Nobody knows that Juliette is on the Secret Room. They think she has been evicted by the Red Phone.</small>
<small>{{note|12|Note 12}}: After an easy dilemma, Zarko has deleted his nomination forever.</small>
<small>{{note|13|Note 13}}: La Voix has announced that two housemates will be evicted on Day 29. Actually, only one housemates (Morgan). All housemates think that Morgan and Geoffrey are evicted. But Geoffrey is on the Secret Room with Juliette, and he'll can help her to choose the two female housemates that Juliette must nominate on Tuesday (Day 33).</small>
<small>{{note|14|Note 14}}: In week six of nominations, only female housemates could nominate.</small>
<small>{{note|15|Note 15}}: In week seven of nominations, Aurelie is the only responsible for nominations.</small>
<small>{{note|16|Note 16}}: In week eight, the contestant are separated in two Houses : The Immune House and The Nomination House. But transfers of contestants takes place during the week. Finally, Juliette, Simon, Ayem and Zelko are nominated beacause they are in the Nomination House at the end of this transfers.
<small>{{note|17|Note 17}}: In week nine, Juliette and Ayem are normally nominated. But Juliette is immune because she solve an enigma of the corridor of 4 elements. Marie is the third girl who topped the appointment, she replaces Juliette. But Marie have a Joker card, she nominate Zelko in its place for Ayem be eliminated.</small>
<small>{{note|18|Note 18}}: Geof has revealed Geoffrey and Marie's secret, he cheated and ask to Zelko to buzz Geoffrey and Marie's secret. Geof and Zelko are nominated by La Voix.</small>
<small>{{note|19|Note 19}}: In week eleven, Juliette have the power of elimination and eliminates AurÃ©lie. But, in reality, AurÃ©lie is in the Secret Room (only Marie and Geoffrey know that) and she becomes the master of nominations this week. She decided on Friday to nominate Juliette, Sabrina and Zelko.
<small>{{note|20|Note 20}}: In week thirteen, Marie solve the secret of the House and won a place in final but she gives his place at AurÃ©lie after a dilemma.
